alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 7:13AM MST until November 24 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches for the valleys. 4 to 6 inches for Lost Trail Pass, Bannock Pass, Lemhi Pass, Gilmore Summit and Williams Creek Summit. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph over Gilmore Summit. * WHERE...Highway 28 Tendoy to Lone Pine, Highway 93 Lost Trail Pass to Gibbonsville, Bannock Pass, Salmon, Lemhi Pass, and Shoup * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County
